name: Academic Essay Evaluation Rubric
description: Standard rubric for evaluating academic essays and written assignments

criteria.name: Thesis and Argumentation
criteria.description: Evaluate the clarity and strength of the thesis statement. Check if arguments are well-developed, logically structured, and effectively support the main claim. Assess the use of evidence and examples.

criteria.name: Organization and Structure
criteria.description: Evaluate the overall organization of the essay. Check for clear introduction, body paragraphs with topic sentences, smooth transitions between ideas, and a strong conclusion that synthesizes the argument.

criteria.name: Language and Style
criteria.description: Evaluate grammar, spelling, punctuation, and sentence structure. Check for appropriate academic tone, varied sentence patterns, and precise word choice. Assess overall readability and flow.

criteria.name: Critical Thinking
criteria.description: Evaluate the depth of analysis and original thinking. Check if the essay goes beyond surface-level discussion, considers multiple perspectives, and demonstrates intellectual engagement with the topic.
